name: ProtonMail 4 *beta*
description: The new v4 design is a step backwards in my opinion. With these styles I've tried to iron out some of these mistakes.
additional_info:
- Changes the circles to boxes with border radius. I find that the circles prevents me from scanning the page; interrupts my flow.
- At the same time I also reduced the row checkbox size, which consequently makes for a bit more compact feel.
- The e-mail row unread font-weight was a bit too heave for my taste; taking too much attention. I reduced from 700 to 500.
- The toolbar icons on the other hand are way to small bordering intelligible. I've increased their sizes a bit and used the aria label to restore icon text as well.
- E-mails labels are more squarish as well.
- Hid a bunch of functions I didn't need.
- Hide message-container pointer arrow
- Add more spacing to message header icons
- Add text back to composer buttons
